reviews.review:
Well, this was a pretty good game. It isn't the best in my library in my opinion but it was good.

Half-Life is about a physician who has to take on both the forces of the US Military and the an alien race. This physicain isn't any ordinary physician, this physicain is Gordon Freeman. This is the beginning of a saga that is still remembered to this day as one of the best first person shooters ever made, but does it live up to that title? Let's take a look.

Unlike most first person shooters that give you the ability to look in all directions Half-Life takes the Doom movement route. Meaning that Gordon Freeman is constantly sprinting every where even when it would be safer to walk or go at a leisurely jogging pace. This both makes and breaks the game. The game is full of platfoming sections where the default super speed will constantly throw you off. The last eighth of the game would be much easier and it would make me grind my teeth a whole lot less during these portions. Where it makes this game is when you have to be constantly running from one side of the level to another, there are a couple of levels like this and they do get annoying, but if you're used to back tracking in games (like myself) you won't have too much trouble dealing with this.

Now let's talk about the enemies in this game, well they aren't bad. The game is very dark and gritty and the enemies are pretty much the same. They don't have too much color to them but which makes them feel like they belong in this world. So here's a noob tip, the first time I saw a Vortigaunt, you know those guys that will charge your armor in Half-Life 2 and are generally friendly towards you, I walked up to it and pressed e, don't do that. If you do that it'll get two or three cheap shots in on you and leave you nearly dead on the easy setting (which is what I played on). Other than that the other enemies are well designed and suited for their purposes, some of which make up entire levels on their own. I especially found it interesting how you had to fight a giant ball sack called Gonarch though three different boss level stages. I don't understand why Gonarch hasn't become a meme yet, I mean it's two of the things that people on the internet obsess about, balls and Half-Life. Why was Gonarch not brought back as a synthasized being in Half-Life 2? And we have the final boss, whom I can't remember the name of but he was well designed and looked like some sort of Alien Overlord. The head crab zombies in this game also look a whole lot more threatening than in Half-Life 2. Having those mouths in their stomachs was a good idea.

Next on the menu to talk about is the music, which is decent at best. It's kind of like Doom as it just kind of suits the mood of what's happening at any moment. Though the songs don't loop, so if you're stuck at a part of the game then you're stuck with just the sounds of the enemies.

The story wasn't bad, but it wasn't really anything compared to Half-Life 2's story. I guess it's a good story for a first try and the usage of portals as a plot point was a pretty good idea.

Age Rating: M for Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Explicit Language, and Disturbing Content.
Overall Rating: 8/10

it plays well and it's fun. If it weren't for the non looping music and sometimes frustrating controls I would have given it 10.

[h1][b]《半条命》：恐怖版的CS[/b][/h1]

《半条命》(Half-Life) 个人评分：9.8/10

 ​优点：
+剧情精赞
+游戏操作性好
+武器各有特色
+敌人AI高
+解密有趣
+中文配音良心
+双结局选择

 ​缺点：
-没字幕
-对新手不是很友好

 ​        我不知道我的标题是否符合，但作为一个错过半条命初代时代却有幸能接触CS1.5和1.6游戏时代的后来者，这游戏，身上有太多CS的影子，即使我知道CS最初只是一个MOD。这样形容可能不太适合，但很抱歉，这真的是我的个人感受，至于为什么会恐怖，其实不恐怖，只是相对CS而言，总是转角遇到爱，经常被吓一跳，所以才会得出《半条命》是恐怖版的CS的言论。

     ​    虽然是十多年前的游戏，但其惊赞的剧情和游戏的操作性就个人觉得绝不亚于当前的FPS大作。和现在大部分FPS不同的是，这游戏不能自动回血，只能靠捡血包和救护箱手动回血（PS：貌似以前大部分的游戏也是靠捡血包回血的），有保护衣，可以在所谓的“加油箱”充能量回复保护衣的护甲值，达到双重的保护，提高安全感。武器各种各样各有特点。

 ​        游戏难度相对较高，哪怕是最简单的难度，我这种手残的渣玩家也不知道挂了多少次。之所以难，是因为敌人的AI非常高，会善于利用地形和你周旋，绝对不能无脑突突突，因为敌人的精准度也非常高，几个敌人同时一起射你马上就会挂掉。而更不能在同一个地方待久，因为突然其来的手榴弹让你死了都不知道发生什么事。所以，要利用好地形，偷窃，迅速躲藏，快速精度杀死敌人，善于利用各种武器。

 ​        还有解谜部分，不难，但要善于观察，一个错误可能会造成自己或其人（科学家，保安）的死亡，造成失去探索隐藏房间的通道。说到科学家，保安，这些人会帮助你，你可以杀掉他们，不会影响剧情。但因为感觉游戏主角是个正面的人，想在这游戏塑造正能量，所以我不会去杀这些无辜之人，甚至有时我会不怕牺牲地去保护这些人。对了，还有训练房间，但对新手不是好友好。中文配音比较良心，口型配合挺同步的，但就是没有字幕。有双结局选择。

 ​        这游戏可能因为场景原因，又或许是不适应十多年前的画质，好多人玩了可能会头晕，包括一开始的我，后来慢慢就适应了。V社忠实粉丝，CS粉丝，以及所有喜欢FPS的玩家不妨玩玩。总体而言，这不失为一部好游戏。强烈推荐 。

[h1]Ladies and Gentleman ecco a voi il padre di tutti gli FPS[/h1]
Chiunque di voi conosce Half Life e spero solo che stiate leggendo questa recensione così, tanto per perdere 1 minuti, perchè se lo state facendo per capire cos'è significa che non c'avete mai giocato e se non c'avete mai giocato...vi siete persi una parte importante dell'infanzia. Non ci sarebbe bisogno di spiegarlo però se proprio devo...la storia in questione vede voi, Gordon Freeman, come scienzato nel laboratorio di ricerca della Black Mesa in fase finale di un'esperimento che andrà storto creando una frattura dimensione portando sulla terra esseri sconosciuti. Sarete voi insieme ad altri scienziati o militari che troverete sulla vostra strada a cercare di richiedere aiuto e raggiungere un laboratorio della struttura dove poter chiudere la frattura. Incontrerete molti nemici sul vostro cammino e dovete riuscere a scappare, nascondervi o ucciderli con le armi che troverete per arrivare alla salvezza.
Avere un account Steam e non possedere questo gioco dovrebbe essere un reato perciò prendetelo prima che sia troppo tardi.
Se aspettate e trovate il bundle a sconto meglio perchè tanto una volta finito vorrete continuare con la storia, giuro.

Would I recomend this?

Reviewer: ...
Reviewer: ...
Reviewer: Perhaps ;)

Its OK (yes, I did it)

Music: Nothing outstanding but it fits the situation... sometimes

Graphics: Horribly aged but well its ages old, so

Gameplay: Source Engine, if you are familiar with CS, Portal and so on you wont have any problems. Its kinda tricky in 
                   precision jumping and stuff and I got stuck in walls and boxes a few times, but well it didnt happen too    
                   often to break the game

Story: A New-Gen wasted mind might wont be impressed but I gotta say the story and atmosphere are genius for the 
           time it was published and it still is. But it kind of is like a raw Diamond. It misses the small things, details and stuff 
           but its many years old, so as said for its time great

Conclusion: For anyone who has no problem with badly aged Graphics, Source Engine and a not too good Soundtrack (own 
                    opinion of course) its a great game. For me it was ok. The gameplay bothered me a little every now and then
                    and all in all it was a mediocre entertainment.

Buy it to make the experience, in the end everybody has to try for themselves but in my eyes its not worth 10€/$. Wait for a Steam Sale, then buy it.

А вы не забыли про Half life?
Я не забыл. Это несомненно один из лучших шутеров прошлого. А может быть и настоящего.

Что же такое Half life?
 Это шутер с прямой подачей интересного сюжета и достаточно умными противниками.

А теперь оъбективно.
 Мне солжно найти тут минусы...
 Из плюсов:
   +Сюжет. Необычно подан и достаточно интересен, если внимательно его изучить.
   +Графика. Нет, я не ошибся игрой. На то время она была действительно лучшей.
   +Геймплей. Более вдумчивый в сравнении с DooM Quake, но и динамичнее чем Operation Flashpoint.
Золотая середина.
   +Звуки и музыка. Они не так хороши, но для игры,созданной малой компанией,просто идеальны.
   +Физика. Counter Strike 1.6 - мод для этой игры , этим всё сказано.
Однозначно хэдкрабов 10 из 10. любителям шутеров настоятельно рекомендуется.

+Приличная графика

[b]Минусы[/b]
-Быстро проходится
-Подвисает иногда 
-Не самые сложные логические головоломки

[b]Итог:[/b] хорошая игра. Рекомендую поиграть всем, кто собирается играть в другие части этой серии.

it is fun

While it may have been good (no, absolutely fantastic) for its time, it has not aged well and no longer holds as a relevant first-person shooter.
The plot is minimalistic, although it was the first to have one at all.
The overall graphics and level design has aged significantly (Halo CE came 3 years later and seems to be [i]way[/i] ahead) to the point where it is unplayable and claustraphobic.
Cannot recommend. I jumped right into hl2 after half completing and the plot made enough sense to me, I recommend doing the same.
10/10 would bang tomorrow

Pros

Balanced Weapons
Sections that require using your brain
Fun Combat
Short but sweet Campaign
Cheap
Worth exploring

Con's

Goofy voice acting 
The fact that you play as a Nucular Phisisist that can't for a sylible 
Walking feels a bit floaty but you get use to it
Overly long intro that was impressive for 1998 but now is just boring





Overall Half Life feels a bit dated playing it today, it's still fun to go back this important piece of gaming history.

Prichod Half-Life-u v druhej polovici 90-tych rokov nabural zavedene postupy FPS zanru a ukazal, ze to ide aj inak a lepsie. Odvtedy je pre mna Half-Life jedna z najikonickejsich znaciek vobec. Ostatne dokazuje to aj fakt, ze aj po tolkych rokoch, je stale vyborne hratelny a obklopeny stale tou neopakovatelnou atmosferou, ktoru dokaze vytvorit snad len Valve.

Povazovat sa za hraca a nevsimat si pritom Half-Life, je nieco tak strasne, ako sa rano zobudit a zistit, ze dosla kava!

Mimochodom, nebyt Half-Life-u, tak by nikdy nevznikol ani Counter Strike.

Güzel anime ama 2. sezonda bozuyor. İlk sezonda güzel böyle sübliminali de dayamışlar bebeğe şiddette, o  nihil bilmemne veledini niye dövüyoruz, o da çocuktur. Ayıptır, Günahtır, Ateisttir bu yaptığınız. O çocuk aslında Gaben'in ilk doğan çocuğudur ama kendisi gibi "zeki" bir adamın öyle bir çocuk doğuramayacağını anladığı için onu boğmuştur aslında çocuğu yoktur çünkü çocukları o doğurmaz ki mk, karısı doğurur o altyapıyı sağlar. Böyle kötü oyunlarla büyüdüğü için
popülasyonumuzun çoğu mal. Ben sürekli Club Penguin oynadım herkese helo yazdım şimdi Stanford'da Ekonomi okuyorum. Siz hala yavşak yavşak gelin eksi atın bu incelemeye gerçi artık eskisi gbi deil ama olsun. Ben adam oldum half lifeyle bağımı kestim artık sizde kesin. ne anlıyosunuz lan 20 sene öncesinin beyinsiz fpsi işte. Ateistler bile artık dine dönüyo siz hala halflife amk. Bu arada Gordon'un gözleri anime için bile fazla büyük, azdım.

Actually one of my favorite games in the series, I actually played the origional half life after having played the second one, but it was a great experience nether the less, The whole concept of the black mesa research facility was really cool.. In many ways I don't think the second installement lived up to the cool factor but hopefully Half Life 3 will be better in that regards, Looking at what valve managed to do with portal 2 theres no doubt in my mind that the "third" installement will be a great game, really looking forward to it.

Honestamente, prefiero el original que la secuela que se quedó por el camino. Sí, todo es tosco, muy viejo, muy casposo, pero al menos Sierra contactó con DL Multimedia y no con un estudio de doblaje londinense y por lo menos puedes elegir el otro final y revolucionó el shooter; sin embargo algunos son detractores porque dicen es lineal y no hay secretos. ¿Habéis mirado bien, boomers? Además, si no vas a por llaves o a por secretos en Doom o Quake o Duke Nukem, obviamente te queda muy lineal. Ahora bien, no me gusta que Gordon Freeman, teniendo a los tres jinetes de Build, el señor Nukem, Lo Wang y Caleb, no hable. Allí es un fallo. El resto, una pasada. Ojalá modders españoles que doblen Half Life 2.

Espera, un par de cosillas, el multijugador es el DM preferido y para mods vas a necesitar este juego, nada de Sven Coop ni nada parecido. Bueno, hay mods que son standalone, pero por ejemplo, Crack Life necesita esto.

Half-Life has got to be one of my favorite games. I hate reading long reviews so I'll keep mine short as possible. It has a very good spooky atmosphere, as well as a difficult world to explore. I enjoyed this game very much and the graphics aren't that bad. I would reccomend Half-Life

I never did get around to playing this when it was released.  I was more into Q3A at the time, which is a pity.  The single player game in Half-Life would have been brilliant for the time.

It is, of course, graphically dated.  It's also a kick in the nuts that will remind you how punishing PC games could be at times.

Recommended for anyone into old FPS games for the single player experience... all three of you.

Really nice campaign. I like how this game doesn't give many hints of what you have to do, you have to work out everything yourself. Playing this older game, I've realised how much modern games spoon feed you in instructions of how to play.

me gusta pensar que es este juego, Half Life es EL JUEGO por excelencia, salió a la venta en 1998 pero en 2015 todavía se juega perfectamente y se siente igual que entonces, sientes que realmente estás dentro, sin vida regenerativa, sin scrips contandote toda la historia, sin cortes que rompen toda la inmersión, realmente Half Life definió como debía ser contar una historia en un juego hace ya tiempo,

Putain ce Old school,j'en redemande ! Heureusement qu'il y'a des mod,sinon je surviverais pas...Le jeu en soit à une atmosphere noir et malsaine,(comme dans doom d'ailleur),c'est pour ça que les old school sont si bien,sa nous plonge plus dans un scénario que dans un call of à tout peter...
Great game would recommend
This game was hard but very satisfying when I finished it, very good old game.
YES!

Había oído hablar mucho de este juego, pero siempre me mantuve reticente a comprarlo por tener en la lista de deseados otros más nuevos. Ahora me arrepiento de no haberlo comprado antes. 
Engancha de principio a fin. No tiene ningún momento en el que pare la acción. Lo recomiendo muchísimo. Y la segunda parte también.
Noch immer ein Klassiker. 10/10
Слабенький симулятор железной дороги

Don't be fooled by the old graphics of this game. Yes, it is 17 years old, and yes, I am recommending it. If you have Portal or Portal 2 (or both) then this game might seem familiar. There are many references to Half Life in the Portal series. Also, the atmosphere of the game is similar to that of the Portal games. It is amazing, even if you might not enjoy the graphics or physics. Deal with it     (ಠ_ಠ)         (ಠ_ಠ)ノ-■-■      (-■_■)
